synopsis.text: This 10-episode anime, set in the futuristic world of Cyberpunk 2077, follows the journey of a street kid who is determined to survive in a city consumed by technology and body modifications. Faced with the prospect of losing everything, he takes the risky decision to become an "Edgerunner," a mercenary outlaw also known as a "Cyberpunk." In the heart of a dystopian metropolis, where dreams are shattered, and corruption is rampant, the young protagonist, David Martinez, seeks to fulfill his mother's dream of reaching the top of Arasaka, the world's leading security corporation. However, an unfortunate incident with a street gang leads him down a path of vengeance and transformation, introducing him to the dangerous world of Edgerunners. With nothing left to lose, David teams up with the captivating data thief, Lucyna 'Lucy' Kushinada, embarking on a perilous journey where he must risk it all to survive.
